original_text: And the incense that you shall make according to its composition, you shall not make for yourselves. It shall be for you holy to the Lord.
korean_text: 네가 여호와를 위하여 만들 향은 거룩한 것이니 너희를 위하여는 그 방법대로 만들지 말라

sentences.original_text: And the incense you shall make
you shall not make for yourselves
It shall be for you holy to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 너희를 위해 여호와께 거룩한 것이 되리라
